quotes: We live only now. Everything else is either passed or is unknown.
It is not titles that honour men, but men that honour titles.
Understanding that rests in what it does not understand is the finest.
The best answer to anger is silence.
The purpose of life is the life of purpose.
If you throw away all thoughts of attainment, you will then come to see the real purpose of your quest.
Love is the expression of one's values.
The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup.
Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.
The man who does not value himself, cannot value anything or anyone.
As soon as you truly commit to making something happen, the ?how' will reveal itself.
It is indeed a radical act of love just to sit down and be quiet for a time by yourself.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
A Penny Saved is a Penny Earned
People inspire you, or they drain you. Pick them wisely.
The world makes way for the man who knows where he is going.
Peace begins with a smile.
Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
The more acquaintances you have, the less you know them.
You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
Growth comes at the point of resistance.
Don't concern yourself with the money. Be of service. Build. Work. Dream. Create.
Confidence breeds beauty.
Those who attain the middle Dominate the whole.
This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.
The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
Death smiles at us all. All we can do is smile back.
Make each day a new horizon.
Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.
The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
Only by attracting the best people will you accomplish great deeds.
If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
There's no coming to consciousness without pain
To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.
The wiser you get, the less you care to look like a fool.
Who you are is always right.
Silence is a source of great strength.
Knowledge isn't power until it is applied.
There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
You have to make time, even for something as universal as staring at the stars.
Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
If you truly love Nature, you will find beauty everywhere.
Cease striving. Then there will be transformation.
The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something.
Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive.
The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
